food.name: Dairy Queen Chicken Strip Basket
food.description: Dairy Queen does more than just Blizzards. The Chicken Strip Basket—chicken served with french fries, Texas toast, and a choice of sauce—is its signature meal.

food.name: Panera Soup
food.description: Scan customer reviews posted on Panera's website, and you'll see that the soup is among the favorite choices of those visiting the fast-casual chain.

food.name: Hardee's Original Thickburger
food.description: Hardee's Thickburgers are massive Black Angus beef burgers, piled with all the traditional fixings. You can order it in 1/4 pound, 1/3 pound, and 3/4 pound iterations, but the 1/3 pound Original is the most popular.

food.name: Little Caesars Crazy Bread
food.description: Little Caesars is best known for pizza, but coming in at a close second is Crazy Bread, its much-loved parmesan-encrusted garlic breadsticks.

food.name: KFC Extra Crispy Chicken
food.description: Much like the beloved original, but even more deeply fried? Of course, this is a must-try fast-food delicacy.

food.name: Subway Cookies
food.description: When you've chosen a healthier lunch (at least compared to the other fast-food options available), it feels perfectly valid to treat yourself to a little dessert. Perhaps that's why Subway cookies are so popular.

food.name: Subway Chicken & Bacon Ranch Melt
food.description: According to Business Insider, the Subway Chicken Bacon Ranch Melt is one of Subway's most popular sandwiches.

food.name: Panera Flatbreads
food.description: Panera started offering flatbread pizzas during the pandemic, and they've quickly become a fan-favorite menu option.

food.name: Qdoba Grilled Adobo Chicken Bowl
food.description: The grilled adobo chicken bowl, complete with queso, guacamole, vegetables, jalapenos, and pico de gallo, is Qdoba's most popular item.

drink.name: Squid Game Frappucino
drink.description: Whether you’ve binged all the way through the hit Korean show or still aren’t convinced, this frapp is sure to be a winner.

drink.name: Apple Martini Refresher
drink.description: Fall might be the season for apples, but honestly, this Refresher is great any time of the year.

drink.name: Pumpkin Pie Frappuccino
drink.description: This one starts off with a Venti Pumpkin Cream Cold Brew with no vanilla. Then ask for three pumps of white mocha, two pumps of cinnamon dolce, and one pump of chai, and top it off with cinnamon powder on top of the foam.

drink.name: Wendy’s Inspired Frosty Frappuccino
drink.description: This drink combines chocolate and caffeine in the best way. Order a Grande Mocha Frappuccino, and ask for it to be made with heavy whipping cream. Add two pumps of vanilla syrup and mocha drizzle, and voila! You’ve got a Frosty with a kick.

drink.name: Luna Lovegood Refresher
drink.description: Banish the Nargles with this Refresher that’s as quirky as Luna! Order a Venti Mango Dragonfruit Lemonade, then ask for light kiwi base and light strawberry puree.
